Zhang Liyin

Group (2010-2011,2014):

Introduction

Zhang Liyin is a Chinese singer and songwriter under Xunfei Music. She made her solo debut under SM Entertainment on September 8, 2006 with the digital single "Timeless", a duet song with former TVXQ! member Xia Junsu. She is a former member of the project group S.M. THE BALLAD. On February 28, 2017, she revealed that she will be leaving SM Entertainment as her contract expired.
